Text: Your Credit Line Has Been IncreasedGerald R Nemec Good news The credit line on your Capital Onec card has been increased to This additional credit is available for you to use right now Take advantage of your credit line increase to purchase a new computer or to go on vacation Or consider the Capital One Smart SwitchSM program which lets you transfer balances from your higherinterestrate credit and charge cards to your Capital One account at your current Fixed APR Check out our Balance Transfer Calculator to see how much you can save Why Smart Switch Smart Switch is a smart move because you could save hundreds of dollars in interest every year by transferring higherinterestrate balances Plus it lets you write just one check at billpaying time and theres no transfer fee Why pay more interest than you have to Make the switch by calling today Its Our Way of Saying Thanks We hope you enjoy the extra financial flexibility your new credit line provides Its our way of saying thanks for being a Preferred Capital One cardholder Sincerely P Schnall Senior Vice President Capital One PS Now its easier than ever to get the things you want or need Take advantage of your increased line of credit today Important Information from Capital One You received this email because you provided Capital One with your email address Your email address is part of your personal information and Capital One and its business partners are committed to providing meaningful privacy protection for their customers To protect your privacy please do not send sensitive account information through email If you would like more information about Capital Ones Privacy Statement please visit legalprivacyshtml If you would like to be excluded from all future email offers from Capital One and its trusted business partners including information about new benefits products and services please visit mucapcaspegeraldnemecenroncom Capital One is a federally registered service mark of Capital One Financial Corporation All rights reserved Capital One Financial Corporation E
